summary: Iteration 2 testing completed. All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend pages (Motore Contabile, Finanziaria) functioning as expected. Fixed route ordering bug in fiscalita_italiana.py.

issues: Chart width/height warnings in console - charts may not render properly on initial load

critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: Route ordering bug in /app/app/routers/fiscalita_italiana.py - /calendario/scadenze-imminenti was being caught by /calendario/{anno} route. Moved specific route before parameterized route.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from iteration 2 are working: 1) Cedolini bug fix with fallback netto->lordo working (totale_lordo > 0), 2) Sistema fiscale with agevolazioni and calendario endpoints working, 3) Saldi finali giustificativi endpoint working, 4) Motore Contabile page with all 4 tabs (Bilancio, SP, CE, Cespiti) working, 5) Finanziaria page with year selector and warning message logic implemented correctly.

saldi_finali_giustificativi.details: Endpoint working, returns empty saldi (no dipendenti with giustificativi)

motore_contabile_page.details: All 4 tabs visible and clickable, Cespiti tab shows 1 cespite (Computer ufficio)

finanziaria_page.details: Page loads with financial data, IVA section, Prima Nota, year selector works. Warning message logic implemented for empty years.

bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.issue: Route /calendario/scadenze-imminenti was being caught by /calendario/{anno} parameterized route
bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.fix: Moved scadenze-imminenti route before the parameterized route
